Thicknesses of 1872 Hidalgo stamps issued in Mexico

Data for Statistical Insight Chapter 1 and Exercise 5.110

Format

A data frame with 485 observations on the following 3 variables.

thickness

a numeric vector

thick

a numeric vector

freq

a numeric vector

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


str(Stamp)
#> 'data.frame':	485 obs. of  3 variables:
#>  $ thickness: num  0.06 0.064 0.064 0.065 0.066 0.068 0.069 0.069 0.069 0.069 ...
#>  $ thick    : num  0.06 0.061 0.062 0.063 0.064 0.065 0.066 0.067 0.068 0.069 ...
#>  $ freq     : int  1 0 0 0 2 1 1 0 1 7 ...
attach(Stamp)
hist(thickness,prob=TRUE,col="lightblue")
lines(density(thickness),lwd=2,col="blue")
t.test(thickness,conf.level=.99)$conf
#> [1] 0.08426759 0.08778189
#> attr(,"conf.level")
#> [1] 0.99
detach(Stamp)
